meanings.definition: To increase in size or amount
meanings.sent1: The plant grows taller every day.
meanings.sent2: My savings account grows slowly over time.
meanings.sent3: I hope my patience grows as fast as my impatience!
meanings.sent4: Her smile grows brighter with each passing moment.
meanings.sent5: The excitement in the room grows like a balloon filling with air.

meanings.sent1: The company grows its business by opening new branches.
meanings.sent2: Children grow physically and mentally as they age.
meanings.sent3: His appetite grows as he watches the delicious food being prepared.
meanings.sent4: The idea grows in complexity as more details are added.
meanings.sent5: The friendship between them grows like a strong tree with deep roots.

meanings.definition: To become larger or taller in stature
meanings.sent1: The sunflower grows taller than all the other flowers.
meanings.sent2: As the child grows, their clothes need to be replaced with larger sizes.
meanings.sent3: His shadow grows longer as the sun sets behind him.
meanings.sent4: The mountain range grows in majesty as you approach it.
meanings.sent5: The anticipation in the room grows like a wave rising before crashing.
